channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta Introduces Spirit LM open source model that combines text and speech inputs/outputs
item.description: Spirit LM Expressive incorporates emotional cues into its speech generation and can detect and reflect anger, surprise, or joy.

item.title: ChatGPT’s Canvas now shows tracked changes
